data.message: Sun rays hits my face as i woke up to the sound of Eminem songs, feels like there is a shine on me, when all the things around me just so grey and black, HOPE Eminem read my text cuz no one see's my vision when i told them that i can b a great choreography 4 their music, they just say it's a S**t, but they don't even know if i was awake or a sleep when i get the ideas, all i know is, it came to me when i was closing my eyes, and listening to the music closely...lol TBN ^-^
